episodes.title: A Religious Cult in Florida? | Koreshan Unity Historic Settlement | Estero, Florida
episodes.description:
A Religious Cult in Florida? | Koreshan Unity Historic Settlement | Estero, Florida

Welcome to a journey through time and ideology as we delve into the captivating story of the Koreshan Unity Historic Settlement. Join us as we unravel the mysteries of this once-thriving communal utopia nestled in the heart of Estero, Florida.

In this immersive exploration, we'll traverse the picturesque landscapes and historic buildings that bear witness to the dreams and aspirations of Cyrus Teed and his followers. Learn about their visionary philosophy, which blended science, spirituality, and social equality in pursuit of a harmonious society.

Discover the fascinating architecture of the settlement, including the iconic Koreshan Unity Planetary Court, where members envisioned a celestial city governed by their unique principles. Wander through the meticulously preserved homes, gardens, and community spaces that offer a glimpse into daily life within this utopian enclave.
